original_text: Thou sayest, Lo, thou hast smitten the Edomites; and thine heart lifteth thee up to boast: abide now at home; why shouldest thou meddle to thine hurt, that thou shouldest fall, even thou, and Judah with thee?
korean_text: 네가 에돔 사람들을 쳤다고 네 마음이 교만하여 자긍하는도다 네 궁에나 있으라 어찌하여 화를 자초하여 너와 유다가 함께 망하고자 하느냐 하나

sentences.original_text: Thou sayest, Lo, thou hast smitten the Edomites
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 말하기를, 보라, 네가 에돔 족속을 쳤다 하고

sentences.original_text: and thine heart lifteth thee up to boast
why shouldest thou meddle to thine hurt
that thou shouldest fall, even thou, and Judah with thee?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 너와 함께 유다도 엎드러지게 하려느냐
